script_line: A man stands alone in a dense forest, looking around with a worried expression as smoke begins to rise in the distance
The man runs through the forest, flames and thick smoke closing in behind him, panic on his face
The man reaches a wide river, pausing to look back at the raging forest fire before preparing to cross
The man wades through the river, struggling against the current as water splashes around him
The man climbs onto the opposite riverbank, exhausted but safe, looking back at the distant fire with relief
